original_text: And will not God give justice to his elect, who cry to him day and night? Will he delay long over them?
korean_text: 하물며 하나님께서 그 밤낮 부르짖는 택하신 자들의 원한을 풀어 주지 아니하시겠느냐 그들에게 오래 참으시겠느냐

sentences.original_text: And will not God give justice to his elect
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그 택하신 자들에게 정의를 베풀지 않으시겠습니까?

sentences.original_text: who cry to him day and night?
Will he delay long over them?
